name: Numeric Combat
description:
Survive as long as you can to earn a highscore. Every time you pull the lever you  roll the dice to gain a new weapon and passive bonus. Be careful, the enemies get a passive bonus from one of your dice as well! Roll into a powerful synergy to decimate the waves of robots before they can react.

Controls:

Jump: W / Up / Space

Pull lever: E / Ctrl / Right Mouse

Attack: Enter / Shift / Left Mouse

Move: A & D / Left & Right
